languages.text:
"Изверглись из зверя оскаленных уст
Силы слова, клич дикой охоты,
Отозвались на него обозленные души!
Из снега и ветра сплелись волчьи тела
Для воинов, умерших нечистою смертью,
Неотомщенных, зла не забывших!
Заскрежетав ледяными зубами,
Подступили они, взвыв в кипящее небо.
Первого брата поверг славный Ульфар..."

"The power of words spewed
from the beast's mouth grinning,
The cry of the wild hunt,
and the embittered souls hearkened!
Out of snow and wind
wolf bodies were woven
for the warriors who died
an unclean death,
the unavenged,
evil never forgetting!
Their ice-fangs gnashing,
they approached,
into the roiling sky howling.
The first brother
by Ulfar was vanquished..."
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
「言葉の力は
笑みとともに獣の口から吐き出され
野生の狩りの叫びが放たれ
恨み抱えし魂が耳を傾けた！
雪と風から
狼の身体が編まれた
穢れた死を遂げた戦士たちは
不浄の死を味わい
復讐も叶わず
悪を決して忘れない！
氷の牙をむき
荒れ狂う空に吠えながら
彼らは近づいていった。
最初の兄弟は
ウルファーの手により打ち負かされた…」
languages.original_text:
"The power of words spewed
from the beast's mouth grinning,
The cry of the wild hunt,
and the embittered souls hearkened!
Out of snow and wind
wolf bodies were woven

languages.text:
“语言的力量，
从野兽之口中喷涌而出。
狂野狩猎的呐喊响彻，
让受苦的灵魂聆听！
狂风和暴雪，
为在不洁的死亡中殒命的战士，
编织出狼的躯壳。
未雪的冤仇，
邪恶何曾忘怀！
他们摩亮了冰冷的獠牙，
步步紧逼，
在纷飞的雪暴中咆哮。
乌尔法的兄弟，
第一个倒下了……”
languages.original_text:
"The power of words spewed
from the beast's mouth grinning,
The cry of the wild hunt,
and the embittered souls hearkened!
Out of snow and wind
wolf bodies were woven
for the warriors who died

第一个倒下了……”

languages.text:
« Le pouvoir des mots jaillit
de la bouche bestiale grimaçante,
appelant à la chasse d'un cri
les âmes ivres d'amertume !
De la neige et du vent,
des corps de loups furent tissés
pour les guerriers victimes
d'un trépas impur
et qui jamais le mal n'oublient
en attendant vengeance !
Leurs crocs de glace sortis,
ils avançaient hardiment
sous le ciel en furie.
Le premier frère
par Ulfar fut vaincu... »
languages.original_text:
"The power of words spewed
from the beast's mouth grinning,
The cry of the wild hunt,
and the embittered souls hearkened!
Out of snow and wind
wolf bodies were woven

languages.text:
«El poder de las palabras despedidas
de las fauces sonrientes de la bestia,
¡la llamada a la salvaje cacería,
escuchada por las almas resentidas!
De viento y nieve se tejieron
los cuerpos de lobo apropiados
para los guerreros que cayeron
presa de una muerte injusta,
¡los no vengados,
que el mal nunca olvidarán!
Sus colmillos de hielo rechinaban
para anunciar su cercanía,
aullando al cielo de melancolía.
El primer hermano
ante Ulfar cayó derrotado...».
languages.original_text:
"The power of words spewed

languages.text:
"Die Macht der Worte,
die grinsend das Ungeheuer ausspuckte,
der Schrei der wilden Jagd
und die verbitterten Seelen lauschten!
Aus Schnee und Wind
wurden Wolfskörper gewoben
für die Krieger, die gestorben waren,
einen unsauberen Tod,
die Ungesühnten,
das Böse nie vergessend!
Mit gefletschten Eiszähnen
näherten sie sich,
heulten in den brodelnden Himmel.
Ihr erster Bruder
wurde von Ulfar besiegt ..."
languages.original_text:
"The power of words spewed

languages.text:
"Canavarın sırıtan ağzından
Kelimelerin gücü fışkırdı
Vahşi avın feryadı
Patlattı hırçın ruhların kulağını!
Kar ve rüzgârdan örülü
Kurt bedenleri belirdi.
Sahipleriyse bunların;
Namertçe can vermişler,
İntikam bekleyen,
Kötülüğe diş bileyenler idi!
Buzdan dişleri gıcırdayan
Kurtlar yaklaştı,
Uğuldayan göklere uzandılar.
İlk kardeşin şansına,
Ulfar'ın bozgununa uğradı..."
languages.original_text:
"The power of words spewed
from the beast's mouth grinning,
The cry of the wild hunt,
and the embittered souls hearkened!
Out of snow and wind
wolf bodies were woven
for the warriors who died
an unclean death,
the unavenged,
evil never forgetting!
Their ice-fangs gnashing,
they approached,
into the roiling sky howling.
The first brother
by Ulfar was vanquished..."

traits.locale_text:
"Canavarın sırıtan ağzından
kelimelerin gücü fışkırdı
Vahşi av etti feryat
ve dinledi hırçın ruhlar!
Kar ve rüzgârın içinden
kurt bedenleri örüldü.
Çünkü ölümleri
kesin olmayanları,
intikamı alınmayanları,
kötüler asla unutmaz!
Buzdan dişleri gıcırdarken
yaklaştılar,
uğuldayan göklere.
İlk kardeş uğradı,
Ulfar tarafından bozguna..."
